## IndexedAccessTypeSchema interface

TypeScript Indexed Access Type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IndexedAccessTypeSchema 
```

## Remarks

`XXX['a' | 'b']` is not a `IndexedAccessType`<!-- -->, which should be a `{@link UnionType}`<!-- -->. (Equivalent to `XXX['a'] | XXX['b']`<!-- -->)

## Example


```ts
type A = SomeInterface['XXX']

```
